submit.ok: Congratulations! You have successfully enrolled { licensePlates } with tapNpay. All future tolls will be sent to you via a daily text message for your review and approval. You will receive 1 or more texts each day you use the toll road and you have { hoursToPay } hours to approve your tolls. For more information, go to https://tapnpay.info. Thank you for using tapNpay!
submit.error: Uh oh! We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. Please try again and if you continue to experience this issue, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us, so we can help! Thank you!

submit.ok: Thank you! We will review your request and respond within 1 business day. Please go to our FAQ's to view helpful information.
submit.error: Uh oh! We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. Please try again and if you continue to experience this issue, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us, so we can help! Thank you!

auth.resend_message: Please send PIN again in { time } seconds
auth.phone_error: Uh oh! We are experiencing a temporary technical issue. Please try again.
auth.pin_error: Uh oh! We are experiencing a temporary technical issue. Please try again.
auth.error_105: We're sorry, your account is currently inactive. Please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us for questions about your account status.
auth.invalid_auth_token: Your authentication session is invalid or expired

welcome.message_default: Congratulations! You have successfully enrolled { licensePlates } with tapNpay. All future tolls will be sent to you via a daily text message for your review and approval. You will receive 1 or more texts each day you use the toll road and you have { hoursToPay } hours to approve your tolls. For more information, go to https://tapnpay.info. Thank you for using tapNpay!
welcome.message_203: We're sorry but we are unable to register you for tapNpay at this time. Please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us so we can help. Thank you!
welcome.message_205: Congratulations! You have successfully enrolled { licensePlates } with tapNpay however, the payment failed. Within 24 hours, all future tolls will be sent to you via a daily text message for your review and approval. You will receive 1 or more texts each day you use the toll road and you have { hoursToPay } hours to approve your tolls. To inquire about the payment failure, contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us. Thank you for using tapNpay!
welcome.message_307: We're sorry but we were unable to register your vehicle for tapNpay and your payment will be refunded in full. Refer to your paper bill for available payment options. Contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us for questions. Thank you from the tapNpay team!
welcome.message_approved: Congratulations! You have successfully paid invoice { invoice } for { amount } and registered your vehicle { licensePlates } to pay future tolls with tapNpay. Within 24 hours, all future tolls will be sent to you via daily text message for review and approval. You will receive 1 or more texts each day you use the toll road and you have { hoursToPay } hours to approve your tolls. For more information, go to https://tapnpay.info. Thank you for using tapNpay!
welcome.message_declined: Per your request, your existing toll bill will not be paid, however, you have successfully enrolled { licensePlates } with tapNpay. All future tolls will be sent to you via daily text message for your review and approval. You will receive 1 or more texts each day you use the toll road and you have { hoursToPay } hours to approve your tolls. For more information, go to https://tapnpay.info. Thank you for using tapNpay!

payment.reg_n_pay_message_has_zip: You have a current invoice { invoice } for { amount } that can be paid with tapNpay. To pay for this invoice, enter your Zip Code found on your cell phone bill then tap Yes. To enroll without paying this outstanding invoice, tap No.
payment.reg_n_pay_message_no_zip: You have a current invoice { invoice } for { amount } that can be paid with tapNpay. To pay for this invoice, tap Yes. To enroll without paying this outstanding invoice, tap No.
payment.payment_error: Uh oh! We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. Please try again and if you continue to experience this issue, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us, so we can help! Thank you!

fleet.header_message: Confirm LPN(s) below then tap PAY to approve the one-time enrollment fee and complete your registration.
fleet.wallet_confirm_message: { amount } will be payed with { wallet }.
fleet.message_declined: Thank you for giving us a try! You will not be charged a service fee and your vehicle is not registered with tapNpay. You are eligible to register at your convenience in the future. Thank you from the tapNpay team!
fleet.message_issues: Weâ€™re sorry but there is a technical issue with your invoice authorization. Please try again later. If you are still unable to authorize your invoice, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us. Thank you!
fleet.message_ok: Congratulations! You have successfully enrolled { licensePlates } with tapNpay. Within 24 hours, all future tolls will be sent to you via a daily text message for your review and approval. You will receive 1 or more texts each day you use the toll road and you have { hoursToPay } hours hours to approve your tolls. For more information, go to https://tapnpay.info. Thank you for using tapNpay!

profile.unregister_vehicles_text: Register and unregister vehicles in the tapNpay services. All invoices and charges must be approved before unregister a vehicle.
profile.deactivate_account_text: Deactivate your account with tapNpay. All invoices and charges must be approved before deactivating your account.
profile.payment_method_text: Change your preferred payment method to be used for future payments.
profile.confirm_deactivate_account: Do you want to deactivate account?
profile.deactivate_account_error: Uh oh! We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. Please try again and if you continue to experience this issue, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us, so we can help! Thank you!
profile.deactivate_account_error_204: This account currently has an outstanding invoice(s). To deactivate your account, please first go to your invoices to authorize the current invoice(s) then deactivate your account again. For questions, please go to https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us.
profile.deactivate_account_error_217: Your account can not be deactivated due to outstanding disputes currently under review.

invoices_list.loading_error: Uh oh! We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. Please try again and if you continue to experience this issue, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us, so we can help! Thank you!
invoices_list.due_in: Due in { time } { time, plural, =0{hours} one{hour} other{hours} }

invoice_detail.confirm_reason_change: All disputed transactions for this invoice will change to { reason }.
invoice_detail.dispute_rejected: The tolling authority has rejected the dispute on this transaction. The transaction will be charged on your cell phone bill when the invoice is accepted. For questions, please go to https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us.

invoice_payment.payment_success: Success! You have approved the charges on Invoice # { invoices } on { date } for the amount of { amount }. To review your authorized payments, please go to the History section at http://tapNpay.biz for details. Thank you for using tapNpay!
invoice_payment.payment_success_fleet_has_disputed: Transactions on tapNpay invoice { disputedInvoices } totaling { disputedAmount } have been disputed and will be reviewed by the tolling authority. If the disputes are accepted, you will not be responsible for payment. If rejected, an invoice will be created and sent to you payment authorization. Questions? https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us
invoice_payment.payment_success_debt_unlock: Welcome back! Your account has been reinstated and within 24 hours, all future tolls will be sent to you via a daily text message for review and approval. You will receive 1 or more texts each day you use the toll road and you have 47 hours to approve your tolls. For more information, go to https://tapnpay.info.
invoice_payment.payment_error: Uh oh! We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. Please try again and if you continue to experience this issue, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us, so we can help! Thank you!
invoice_payment.payment_error_min_limit: Your invoice does not meet the required minimum amount. Additional tolls incurred within the 47-hour payment window will be added to this invoice for your review and approval. After 47-hours, your invoice will be sent back to the toll authority for billing by mail. Questions? Contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us.
invoice_payment.payment_error_max_limit: Your payment processor rejected approval for this invoice as daily or monthly account limits may have been exceeded. Other payment options are available above. Questions? https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us
invoice_payment.payment_error_300: Your cell phone carrier rejected your approval to pay this invoice. Contact the carrier to resolve possible account issues. Other payment options are available above. Questions? https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us
invoice_payment.payment_error_301: Uh oh! We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. If you continue to experience this issue, please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us, so we can help! Thank you!
invoice_payment.payment_error_302: Your cell phone carrier rejected your approval to pay invoice { invoices } totaling { amount }. Contact the carrier to resolve possible account issues. Other payment options are available above. Questions? Contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us.
invoice_payment.payment_error_303: We're sorry, but you have reached the number of allowable attempts to enter a valid Zip Code for your cell phone account. Your tapNpay has been temporarily deactivated. Please contact us at https://tapnpay.biz/contact-us if you would like your account reinstated. Thank you!
invoice_payment.payment_error_304: We're sorry, but the zip code you submitted does not match the zip code on your cell phone account. After several unsuccessful attempts, your tapNpay account will be temporarily deactivated. Please contact your service provider to determine the correct zip code on your cell phone account. Thank you!
invoice_payment.payment_error_308: We're sorry, but your payment method was declined. Please choose another payment method.
invoice_payment.payment_error_309: We're sorry, but your card was declined due to insufficient credit. Please choose another payment method.
invoice_payment.payment_error_312: To avoid double charging your PayPal account, we only allow payment requests once per minute. Please check your Invoice status later and attempt to pay again if needed.
invoice_payment.confirm_message: Pay { amount } with { wallet }? Tap YES below.

specific.amount_too_large: The specified amount is greater than the maximum amount allowed.
specific.amount_too_small: The specified amount is less than the minimum amount allowed.
specific.authentication_required: The payment requires authentication to proceed.
specific.balance_insufficient: The transfer or payout could not be completed because the associated account does not have a sufficient balance available.
specific.card_decline_rate_limit_exceeded: This card has been declined too many times. You can try to charge this card again after 24 hours.
specific.customer_max_payment_methods: You have added the maximum number of payment methods. Please delete your existing payment method to add a new one.
specific.expired_card: The card has expired. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
specific.incorrect_address: The card's address is incorrect. Check the card's address or use a different card.
specific.incorrect_cvc: The card's security code is incorrect. Check the card's security code or use a different card.
specific.incorrect_number: The card number is incorrect. Check the card's number or use a different card.
specific.incorrect_zip: The card's postal code is incorrect. Check the card's postal code or use a different card.
specific.invalid_card_type: This card type is not supported for payouts. Provide a non-prepaid debit card instead.
specific.invalid_characters: Please check that the form is filled out correctly.
specific.invalid_cvc: The card's security code is invalid. Check the card's security code or use a different card.
specific.invalid_expiry_month: The card's expiration month is incorrect. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
specific.invalid_expiry_year: The card's expiration year is incorrect. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
specific.invalid_number: The card number is invalid. Check the card details or use a different card.
specific.payment_intent_authentication_failure: The provided payment method has failed authentication.
specific.payment_method_provider_timeout: The payment method failed due to a timeout.
specific.setup_attempt_failed: An error occurred while adding a new payment method.
specific.setup_intent_authentication_failure: The provided payment method has failed authentication.
specific.postal_code_invalid: The postal code provided was incorrect.
specific.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the card. Try again later or with a different payment method.

common.generic: We are having some technical difficulties and are working quickly to fix them. Please try again later.
common.card_failure: A bank card error has occurred. Please try again later.
common.payment_failure: An error occurred during payment. Please try again later.

decline.call_issuer: Your card was declined. You can call your bank for details.
decline.card_velocity_exceeded: Your card was declined for making repeated attempts too frequently.
decline.currency_not_supported: Your card is not supported for this currency.
decline.fake_merchant_test_card: This verification trigger card was declined. This card must be used for a Custom account created in testmode.
decline.live_mode_test_card: Your card was declined. Your request was in live mode, but used a known test card.
decline.pin_try_exceeded: Allowable number of PIN tries exceeded.
decline.test_mode_live_card: Your card was declined. Your request was in test mode, but used a non test card. For a list of valid test cards, visit: https://stripe.com/docs/testing.
decline.transaction_not_allowed: Your card does not support this type of purchase.
decline.authentication_required: The card was declined as the transaction requires authentication.
decline.do_not_honor: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.do_not_try_again: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.duplicate_transaction: A transaction with identical amount and credit card information was submitted very recently.
decline.fraudulent: The payment has been declined as Stripe suspects it is fraudulent.
decline.invalid_pin: The PIN entered is incorrect. This decline code only applies to payments made with a card reader.
decline.issuer_not_available: The card issuer could not be reached, so the payment could not be authorized.
decline.lost_card: The card has been declined because it is reported lost.
decline.merchant_blacklist: The payment has been declined because it matches a value on the Stripe user's block list.
decline.new_account_information_available: The card, or account the card is connected to, is invalid.
decline.no_action_taken: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.offline_pin_required: The card has been declined as it requires a PIN.
decline.online_or_offline_pin_required: The card has been declined as it requires a PIN.
decline.pickup_card: The card cannot be used to make this payment (it is possible it has been reported lost or stolen).
decline.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the card.
decline.reenter_transaction: The payment could not be processed by the issuer for an unknown reason.
decline.restricted_card: The card cannot be used to make this payment (it is possible it has been reported lost or stolen).
decline.revocation_of_all_authorizations: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.revocation_of_authorization: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.security_violation: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.service_not_allowed: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.stolen_card: The payment has been declined because the card is reported stolen.
decline.stop_payment_order: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.testmode_decline: A Stripe test card number was used.
decline.try_again_later: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
decline.withdrawal_count_limit_exceeded: The customer has exceeded the balance or credit limit available on their card.

debt_lock.welcome_message: Welcome back! It appears you have an unpaid balance with tapNpay. To reactivate your account, tap the link below to pay your outstanding balance.
